title: Scheduled Maintenance - Patch 5.20 - 14/10/2015
body: On 14/10/15, starting at 04:00AM Sydney Time (17:00 UTC), ranked queues will be disabled in preparation for patch 5.20. At 05:30AM Sydney Time (18:30 UTC), the servers will be shut down and all games currently in progress will end in a draw and stats will not be recorded. We estimate the battlegrounds will be unavailable for 3 hours.

replies.body: Typo - fixed, thanks for pointing it out :)
when is one for all gonna be live?
Unable to connect to chat when login of client and during champ select. Also game quits when it is about to start game. Sidenote - Kindred has been picked in all 2 games so far {{champion:203}} .
